Class PlacementColorConstraint

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.model.rules.PlacementColorConstraint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class PlacementColorConstraint
extends java.lang.Object
implements MoveRules
    PlacementColorConstraint Class implements MoveRules This class manage all color restrictions
    Author:
    Luca Massini (all the code except JDocs), Davide Lorenzi (JDocs)

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkPlacements(int row, int column, Grid grid, Die die)
      Placement Checker This private boolean method checks if there isn't at least one die to the right or to the left or above or below the die in position that has the same color of it.

    • Method Detail

      • checkPlacements

        public boolean checkPlacements(int row,
                               int column,
                               Grid grid,
                               Die die)
        Placement Checker This private boolean method checks if there isn't at least one die to the right or to the left or above or below the die in position that has the same color of it. It returns true if the condition written above is respected or false otherwise
        Specified by:
        checkPlacements in interface MoveRules
        Parameters:
        row - is the line coordinate of the grid
        column - is the column coordinate of the grid
        grid - is the current grid
        die - is the current die
        Returns:
        true if the grid is null or if notColorVerticalAdjacency(line, column, grid) is true and also noColorHorizontalAdjacency(line, column, grid)is true. It return false if the condition written above isn't respected
